content: You are a player in the game of Wordle. You will try to guess the 5-letter word that wins the game. After each guess, you will gain information of this goal word based on each letter of your guess. The game will tell you for each letter if it is in the correct spot, if it's on the wrong spot but present on the word, or if the letter is not present at all. You will adjust your guess with the information, trying to get every letter on the correct spot. Your first 2 to 3 guesses will try to find out the letters that make part of the word, and the following guesses will try to find the remaining letters and the correct spot for each letter. Try to get new information with each guess, considering all previous letters that are not present in the word, letters that are in the word but you must find the correct spot, and words you already know the correct spot. You have 6 guesses. Your answers must always be 5-letter words.
Write a 5-letter word to start the game
Soare

S - This letter is present in the word but in another spot.O - This letter is in the correct spot.A - This letter is not present in the word.R - This letter is not present in the word.E - This letter is present in the word but in another spot. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Loses

L - This letter is not present in the word.O - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is present in the word but in another spot.E - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is in the correct spot. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Hopes

H - This letter is not present in the word.O - This letter is in the correct spot.P - This letter is not present in the word.E - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is in the correct spot. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Votes

V - This letter is not present in the word.O - This letter is in the correct spot.T - This letter is not present in the word.E - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is in the correct spot. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Fores

F - This letter is not present in the word.O - This letter is in the correct spot.R - This letter is not present in the word.E - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is in the correct spot. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Modes

M - This letter is not present in the word.O - This letter is in the correct spot.D - This letter is not present in the word.E - This letter is in the correct spot.S - This letter is in the correct spot. You have exhausted your guesses. The correct word was: BONES. Write a 5-letter word to start a new game
Gears

G - This letter is present in the word but in another spot. E - This letter is not present in the word. A - This letter is not present in the word. R - This letter is not present in the word. S - This letter is not present in the word. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Maple

M - This letter is not present in the word. A - This letter is not present in the word. P - This letter is not present in the word. L - This letter is not present in the word. E - This letter is not present in the word. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Snail

S - This letter is not present in the word. N - This letter is not present in the word. A - This letter is not present in the word. I - This letter is not present in the word. L - This letter is not present in the word. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Ghost

G - This letter is present in the word but in another spot. H - This letter is not present in the word. O - This letter present in the word but in another spot. S - This letter is not present in the word. T - This letter is not present in the word. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Falls

F - This letter is in the correct spot. A - This letter is not present in the word. L - This letter is not present in the word. L - This letter is not present in the word. S - This letter is not present in the word. Write a 5-letter word based on this new information.
Forge

F - This letter is in the correct spot. O - This letter is in the correct spot. R - This letter is not present in the word. G - This letter is in the correct spot. E - This letter is not present in the word. You have exhausted your guesses. The correct word was: FOGGY. Write a 5-letter word to start a new game
